EmailTemplate.description: This template invites customers to register for GlobalMeet training or self train by viewing the GlobalMeet tutorials.
EmailTemplate.name: GlobalMeet - Training
EmailTemplate.subject: We're here to help - take a GlobalMeet training class
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TAKE A TRAINING CLASS WE'RE HERE TO HELP
We hope you're enjoying your upgraded GlobalMeet® service, and would like to invite you to a training session just for new users like you.
In this one hour webinar, you will learn how to:
Use the GlobalMeet Outlook Toolbar to send audio and web meeting invites Join a GlobalMeet web meeting from your toolbar, desktop app, browser or iPad Have the meeting call you from the "Connect Me" feature Use attendee panel controls, share your screen or share files Find important resources and support through the GlobalMeet Community
Register for the GlobalMeet 101-Basics training today.
Prefer to self-train? Take a few minutes to watch these tutorials. All are short, informative and easy to follow.
Questions? As your account manager, I'm here to help you get started with your upgraded service as soon as possible. Contact me today!
Regards, {!User.FirstName}{!User.LastName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
© Premiere Global Services, Inc. and/or its affiliates | PGi 3280 Peachtree Road, N.E., Suite 1000 Atlanta, GA 30305
